H0.text: Air is the best conductor of electricity.

H1.text: Cork is the best conductor of electricity.

H2.text: Water is the best conductor of electricity, as requested by the question "Which would be the best conductor of electricity?"

H3.text: Silver is the best conductor of electricity.

A4.text: Silver, although it is the least resistive metal known, has a high density and performs similarly to copper by this measure, but is much more expensive.

A5.text: A vacuum does not conduct electricity at all.
